\u2705: Success / Task complete — Config saved, files processed
\u274c: Failure / Error — File not found, invalid config
\u26a0\ufe0f: Warning / Incomplete state — Missing value, partially loaded data
\ud83d\udd0d: Inspection / Debug — Log current function, inspecting widgets
\ud83d\udca1: Hint / Recommendation — Suggested action, fallback explanation
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f: Dev tool / Manual intervention — Test runner, config editor, tools menu
\ud83d\udce6: File / Package — Exporting configs, zipping results
\ud83d\udcc2: Folder operation — Scanning directory, setting paths
\ud83c\udf9b\ufe0f: UI component adjusted — Theme applied, preview updated
\ud83c\udf00: Startup / Loading — App launch, loading config on boot
\ud83d\udcdc: Config log — Printing config data, JSON schema checks
\ud83d\udc41\ufe0f: Widget focus change — Track focus, highlight selection
\ud83e\uddea: Test-related — Running tests, unit test report
\ud83d\udeab: Denied / Disabled — Invalid shortcut, feature not available
\ud83d\udd01: Refresh / Reload — Scanned folder, updated listbox
\ud83d\udcbe: Saved — Config or subtitle save confirmed
